extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every

extended_input_schema.hint: Select the days on which your schedule should repeat.
extended_input_schema.label: Days of the month
extended_input_schema.name: days_of_month

extended_input_schema.hint: Set a time to schedule the job.
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger at
extended_input_schema.name: trigger_at

extended_input_schema.hint: Select the timezone to use. Leave it blank to use {{authUser.account_timezone}}
extended_input_schema.label: Timezone
extended_input_schema.name: timezone

extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.name: start_after

input.sql:
select 
 OPPORTUNITY_ROLES
,TRX_NUMBER,TRX_DATE
,TRX_DATE_FISCAL_QUARTER_SHORTNAME
,TRX_DATE_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER
,TRX_DATE_FISCAL_YEAR_NAME
,TRX_CRM_FORECAST_CATEGORY
,TRX_COUNTRY_OF_ORDER
,TRX_SPLIT_COVERAGE_SEGMENT
,SOURCE_ROUTE_TO_MARKET
,TRX_ROUTE_TO_MARKET
,TRX_STATUS,TRX_TYPE
,TRX_SOURCE
,TRX_CLOSED_BOOKING_FLAG
,TRANSACTION_TYPE
,PRODUCT_CODE
,PARTNER_ALIGNMENT_FOR_REBATES
,ORDERED_QUANTITY_MIN
,PRODUCT_SPLIT_OFFERING_GROUP
,TRX_PARTNER_MDM_PARTY_ID
,SNAPSHOT_DATE
,ACV_AMOUNT_USD_CY_PR_WITH_HCS_DRAWDOWN
,ACCOUNT_TYPE
,SOURCE_ID
,SOURCE_SYSTEM
,USAGE_TYPE
,ACCOUNT_ID
,MEMBER_ID
,TRANSACTION_JOURNAL_ID
 from PARTNERPROGRAMS_DB.MARTS.REBATES_STAGE_TJ
 where transaction_journal_id is null

properties.label: Roll back records when errors occur?
properties.hint: When Yes, the batch is rolled back when the creation of an object fails. If the batch is larger than 200 records, only the affected batch is rolled back. The default, No, is recommended.

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: ="Workato Rebates Bookings Transaction Journal Job Status | Job ID : " + _dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_id"]}')
input.body:
="ID: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_id"]}') || '') + "
" + "URL: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_url"]}') || '') + "
" + "Name: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_name"]}') || '') + "
" + "Path: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_path"]}') || '') + "
" + "Job ID: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_id"]}') || '') + "
" + "Job URL: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_url"]}') || '') + "

" + "Results:
" + "Total Records: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b80d636d","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"TotalRecords"]}') || '') + "
" + "Success: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b80d636d","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"SuccessRecords"]}') || '') + "
" + "Fail: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b80d636d","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"FailedRecords"]}') || '') + "

" + "Errors:
" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + ( (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"d3fdab45","path":["list_items"]}') || []) .format_map( "" + "" + "" + "" + "" ) ).join("") + "
Source IDRelated DetailError Message
%{LogList_source_ID}" + "Account ID: %{LogList_AccountID}
" + "Member ID: %{LogList_MemberID}
" + "MDM Party ID: %{LogList_MDMPartyID}
" + "ACV Amount: %{LogList_ACVAmount}" + "		%{LogList_Message}
"
